code: import i18next from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import EN from'./locales/en.json';import TR from'./locales/tr.json';const resources={en:{translation:EN},tr:{translation:TR}};localStorage.setItem('lang',"tr");i18next.use(initReactI18next).init({resources,fallbackLng:'tr',lng:localStorage.getItem('lang')||'tr',interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18next;
